description: This course aims to revisit the core concepts of ethics and law, professionalism and communication first encountered in Phase 1 of the MD program and situate them within the clinical environment of Year 3. It is delivered concurrently with clinical rotations in Semester 2 of year 3, with horizontal integration between clinical courses and the curriculum content in Preparation for Practice 1.
prerequisites: Successful completion of Years 1 and 2 of the MD program.
